en.lang_selector:
This is a demo bot. For further work, select your language
https://github.com/Ton-pro/jetton-airdrop-telegram-bot
en.not_subscribed:
You have not subscribed to the channels

Subscribe and try again
en.connect: Select a wallet to connect to:
en.time_connect: You have chosen: {wal_name} Link your wallet within 5 minutes
en.timeout_error: Time's up! Update the connection link
en.wallet_connected: You have successfully linked a TON wallet {wallet}
en.wallet_disconnected: You have successfully unlinked your wallet
en.access_date_announcement: Airdrop claim service is currently under development
en.payment_instruction: Pay 0.009 Ton from the wallet {wallet}: Wallet for payment: {WALLET_PAY} Translation Commentary: {comment} Summation: 0.009 ton โ๏ธ If an invalid comment is specified, the funds sent may be lost. At the moment the wallet verification is implemented through traction tracking, but in the future it will be possible to verify via TON Connect
en.wallet_not_verified: Your wallet is not verified. Please bind and verify your wallet to use all the bot's features.
en.no_airdrop: There are no active airdrops right now
en.successful_airdrop:
You have successfully participated in the airdrop!

The amount: {amount} ${name}
en.completed_airdrop: You have already received a payment in this airdrop
en.failed_airdrop: The maximum number of participants has been exceeded
en.user_rejects:
You canceled the confirmation!

You are not participating in airdrop
en.timeout_airdrop:
The time for confirmation is over!

You are not participating in airdrop
en.no_server: The operation could not be performed on the server
en.bad_payment:
The payment was not found

Check the transfer, if you have made it, wait a couple of minutes
en.successful_payment:
The withdrawal of the funds is approved!

Within a few minutes, the funds will be credited to your wallet
en.wait_payment: Confirmation of participation To receive an airdrop, you need to confirm your participation by paying a transfer fee Airdrop amount: {amount} {name} The amount of the commission: {fee} TON
